snippet: President Obama intends to name Mayor Julián Castro of San Antonio to his cabinet, raising Mr. Castro’s national profile before the 2016 election.
abstract: Pres Obama prepares to nominate Julian Castro of San Antonio as his new secretary of housing and urban development, raising one of his party's Hispanic rising stars as part of a cabinet shuffle that has possible implications for the 2016 presidential election.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and PETER BAKER
byline.contributor: Jason Horowitz and Michael D. Shear contributed reporting from Washington, and Amy Chozick from New York.

lead_paragraph: President Obama intends to name Mayor Julián Castro of San Antonio to his cabinet, raising Mr. Castro’s national profile before the 2016 election.

headline.main: San Antonio Mayor Julián Castro Is Said to Be HUD Pick in Cabinet Reshuffling
headline.print_headline: San Antonio Mayor Is Said to Be a Cabinet Pick
